feed.title: LinkedIn Job Analysis RSS Feed
feed.subtitle: An RSS feed of job analysis from the LinkedIn agent.

entry.title: AI Platform Engineer AI Platform Engineer with verification
entry.content:
üè¢ Ferring Pharmaceuticals ‚Äî AI Platform Engineer

üìç Lisbon, Lisbon, Portugal | üîÑ Hybrid | üí∞ Not specified
‚úÖ Fit: Strong

Justification: The profile demonstrates a strong match with the job requirements, particularly in Python, SQL, and experience in CI/CD processes.

‚úÖ Matching Skills:

  • Python: Profile shows extensive experience, required for AI solutions.
  • SQL: Necessary for data operations, well-matched with candidate's expertise.
  • CI/CD: Experience with DevOps practices aligns with job requirements.
  • Azure: Profile includes knowledge of Azure cloud services, essential for the role.
  • FastAPI: Relevant for the job's requirement of web development frameworks.
  • Machine Learning: Proven experience in delivering ML projects meets job expectations.

‚ùå Missing Skills:

  • Databricks: Specific experience with the Databricks ecosystem was not mentioned in the profile.
  • TensorFlow: Experience with AI frameworks like TensorFlow is noted as preferable by the job.
  • Containerization: Familiarity with Docker or Kubernetes was not specified.
  • IaC Tools: Not mentioned in the profile, while experience with tools like Terraform is a plus.

üìù Notes: The candidate has strong qualifications, but additional experience with specific AI frameworks and tools would strengthen their fit for this role.

About Ferring Pharmaceuticals: Ferring Pharmaceuticals is a Swiss multinational biopharmaceutical company that specializes in reproductive health, maternal health, gastroenterology, and urology. The company was founded in 1950 and focuses on developing treatments and therapies in its core therapeutic areas.

Profile: LinkedIn

entry.title: Senior AI Engineer Senior AI Engineer
entry.content:
üè¢ Smart Consulting ‚Äî Senior AI Engineer

üìç Braga, Portugal | üîÑ Hybrid | üí∞ Not specified
‚öñÔ∏è Fit: Medium

Justification: The candidate possesses relevant skills in Python and SQL, but lacks experience with Google Cloud Platform and Apache Airflow which are essential for the role.

‚úÖ Matching Skills:

  • Python: Profile shows proficiency and is required for developing data pipelines.
  • SQL: Relevant for writing optimized queries as per job requirements.

‚ùå Missing Skills:

  • Google Cloud Platform (GCP): The job requires proficiency in GCP, which is not mentioned in the profile.
  • Apache Airflow / Cloud Composer: Essential for developing and maintaining workflows, and not found in the profile.
  • English Proficiency (B2 level): Required for effective communication, not specified in the profile.

üìù Notes: The candidate‚Äôs experience in cloud services mostly revolves around Azure technologies, which may not directly translate to GCP capabilities.

About Smart Consulting: Smart Consulting is an independent consulting company that specializes in Smart Card environments, with a focus on providing services and solutions related to smart card technology.

Profile: LinkedIn

entry.title: Lead AI Engineer Lead AI Engineer
entry.content:
üè¢ CoreMedia Portugal ‚Äî Lead AI Engineer

üìç Porto Metropolitan Area (Hybrid) | üîÑ Hybrid | üí∞ Not specified
‚öñÔ∏è Fit: Medium

Justification: The candidate possesses a wide range of skills in AI, Python, and cloud services, but lacks some specific technologies mentioned in the job description.

‚úÖ Matching Skills:

  • Python: Profile shows experience in Python which is applicable for backend development and AI.
  • Azure: Candidate has a strong background in Azure services, which is necessary for deploying AI systems.
  • AI Services: Experience with Cognitive Services and OpenAI aligns well with the AI-focused role.
  • REST APIs: Candidate's skill in REST frameworks is relevant for developing and consuming APIs.
  • DevOps: Knowledge in CI/CD and Azure DevOps provides valuable skills to manage AI deployments.

‚ùå Missing Skills:

  • PHP: The job specifies PHP as a primary backend language; the candidate has no PHP experience.
  • RAG architecture: The job requires hands-on experience with RAG pipelines which is not indicated in the profile.
  • LangChain & LangSmith: Familiarity with these specific technologies is necessary and is absent in the profile.
  • Vector databases: Candidate lacks experience with vector databases like ChromaDB, which are important for the role.

üìù Notes: The candidate's academic background in Computer Science and Cybersecurity, along with several relevant Microsoft certifications, contribute positively, making them a viable candidate despite the missing skills.

About CoreMedia Portugal: CoreMedia Portugal appears to be connected to CoreMedia GmbH, a Hamburg company that provides Digital Experience Platform (DXP) and Content Management software solutions. Their presence in Portugal enhances their services in digital experience and content management.

Profile: LinkedIn

entry.title: Senior AI Engineer Senior AI Engineer with verification
entry.content:
üè¢ Ducker Carlisle ‚Äî Senior AI Engineer

üìç Lisbon, Portugal | üîÑ Hybrid | üí∞ Not specified
‚úÖ Fit: Strong

Justification: The candidate's expertise in Python, experience with Azure, and knowledge of AI solutions aligns well with the job requirements.

‚úÖ Matching Skills:

  • Python: The job requires proficiency in Python, which is a primary skill in the profile.
  • SQL: The job mentions SQL, which is included in the candidate's skills.
  • Azure: Familiarity with Azure is part of the candidate's profile and is beneficial for this role.
  • AI / ML Tools: Experience with Semantic Kernel and LangChain aligns with the role's focus on AI.

‚ùå Missing Skills:

  • Large Language Models: The job emphasizes familiarity with LLMs like GPT, which is not explicitly mentioned in the profile.
  • Data Science: The requirement for coursework or experience in data science is not covered in the candidate's background.

üìù Notes: The candidate has a strong foundation in Cybersecurity, which may contribute to a comprehensive understanding of AI system security and ethics but lacks specific experience with Cloud AI tools across their projects.

About Ducker Carlisle: Ducker Carlisle is a global consulting and M&A advisory company that provides insights, benchmarking, and strategy solutions to businesses and private equity firms worldwide. The company specializes in business strategy consulting and M&A support services across key industry sectors, with decades of experience helping clients achieve growth and profitability. Ducker Carlisle has been expanding its global presence, including the opening of a new London office, and positions itself as a trusted partner that translates strategic ideas into measurable results for executives and their teams.

Profile: LinkedIn

entry.title: Machine Learning Consultant Machine Learning Consultant
entry.content:
üè¢ Sysmatch ‚Äî Machine Learning Consultant

üìç Lisbon, Portugal | üîÑ Hybrid - 2/3x per week | üí∞ Not specified
‚úÖ Fit: Strong

Justification: The candidate's experience in Python and various AI / ML Tools aligns well with the job requirements, particularly in machine learning and software engineering.

‚úÖ Matching Skills:

  • Python: Profile shows proficiency in this language, which is specifically required for the role.
  • Azure: Experience with Azure services aligns with the requirements for MLOps and model development.
  • AI / ML Tools: Familiarity with tools like LangChain and Semantic Kernel suggests capability in implementing ML solutions.
  • Databases: Experience with CosmosDB shows an understanding of data management, which is relevant for ML models.
  • Cloud & DevOps: Knowledge of Azure DevOps and CI/CD is important for MLOps tasks mentioned in the job description.

‚ùå Missing Skills:

  • TensorFlow: Required by the job for ML implementation, not listed in the profile.
  • Pytorch: This is also mentioned in the job requirements but is not part of the candidate's skills.
  • Natural Language Processing: Experience with NLP is essential for this role, currently unspecified in the profile.
  • Vertex AI: Experience with this platform is needed for model deployment and management.

üìù Notes: The candidate has a strong background in both Cybersecurity and AI / ML, making them a versatile fit, though additional training may be required for specific tools outlined in the job.

About Sysmatch: Sysmatch is an IT Consultancy and Outsourcing Company that has been operating in the technology market for almost two decades since its founding in 1999. The company specializes in providing a wide range of technological solutions, leveraging the accumulated know-how and experience of their consultants to implement robust and scalable solutions tailored to client needs. With a workforce of 51-200 employees and 65 associated LinkedIn members, Sysmatch positions itself as a flexible, adaptable, innovative and forward-looking organization in the Information Technology & Services industry, focusing on delivering customized IT solutions and outsourcing services to meet diverse business requirements.

Profile: LinkedIn

entry.title: Senior AI Engineer Senior AI Engineer
entry.content:
üè¢ Allia Health Group ‚Äî Senior AI Engineer

üìç Madeira Island, Portugal (Hybrid) | üîÑ Hybrid | üí∞ Not specified
‚úÖ Fit: Strong

Justification: The candidate possesses over 80% of the required skills including expertise in Python, AI techniques, and Azure services that are crucial for this role.

‚úÖ Matching Skills:

  • Python: Profile includes strong proficiency, which is essential for AI/ML projects.
  • Azure: Extensive experience listed, including Azure Machine Learning which aligns with the job's focus on cloud AI.
  • Machine Learning: Relevant frameworks and tools are well covered, including practical experience with TensorFlow and scikit-learn.
  • CI/CD: Candidate's knowledge of CI/CD practices complements the requirement for MLOps in the job description.
  • Containerization: Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes aligns with the deployment requirements.

‚ùå Missing Skills:

  • Google Cloud Vertex AI: Job prefers experience with this specific cloud platform, which is not mentioned in the profile.
  • NLP: Although the candidate has AI/ML experience, no specific mention of Natural Language Processing expertise.
  • Looker: The job description references this BI tool, which was not indicated in the profile‚Äôs skills.

üìù Notes: The candidate‚Äôs strong background in AI and Azure positions them well for the role, though they may need to familiarize themselves with Google Cloud tools.

About Allia Health Group: Allia Health Group is a specialized company that brings together a unique team of leading medical, legal, healthcare insurance, and practice management experts who focus on solving financial challenges within the healthcare industry. The company operates as a multidisciplinary organization that leverages expertise across various sectors to address complex financial issues faced by healthcare providers and related businesses. Their integrated approach combines medical knowledge with legal expertise, insurance understanding, and practice management skills to provide comprehensive solutions for their clients' financial needs in the healthcare space.

Profile: LinkedIn

entry.title: MLOps Engineer MLOps Engineer
entry.content:
üè¢ Adentis Portugal ‚Äî MLOps Engineer

üìç Lisbon, Portugal (Hybrid) | üîÑ Hybrid | üí∞ Not specified
‚úÖ Fit: Strong

Justification: The candidate possesses extensive experience in Python, Azure, and relevant machine learning frameworks, which aligns well with essential job requirements.

‚úÖ Matching Skills:

  • Python: Required for developing machine learning models and automated data pipelines, which the candidate excels in.
  • Azure: Strong background in Azure and related services matches seamlessly with the job's cloud infrastructure requirements.
  • CosmosDB: Familiarity with databases like CosmosDB aligns with data pipeline management and processing tasks in the role.
  • Machine Learning: Experience in Machine Learning, including model development and automation, is a direct match for the position.
  • Data Engineering: Knowledge of data engineering principles complements the role‚Äôs focus on data processing and feature stores.
  • Automation: Experience with workflow automation tools supports the job's requirements for seamless integration processes.

‚ùå Missing Skills:

  • R or Scala: The job mentions proficiency in R or Scala, which are not part of the candidate's profile.
  • Kafka: Experience with Kafka is needed, but the candidate does not list this as part of their skills.
  • TensorFlow or PyTorch: The job requires knowledge of these machine learning libraries, which are not present in the profile.

üìù Notes: The candidate's academic qualifications in Cybersecurity and Computer Science further strengthen their fit, especially for modeling and data integrity tasks. Continuous professional development through certifications also aligns with the company's focus on growth.

About Adentis Portugal: Adentis Portugal is a Portuguese technology consultancy company that specializes in strategy, research and development, and nearshore services. The company has a strong focus on Mobility solutions and provides technology consulting services to help businesses with their digital transformation needs. As a consultancy firm, Adentis Portugal leverages its expertise to deliver strategic technology solutions and development services, positioning itself as a key player in Portugal's technology services sector with particular emphasis on mobility-related projects and nearshore outsourcing capabilities.

Profile: LinkedIn
